data.headline: DOWNASDAQS&P 500RUSSELL 2000DOW - Stock Price Chart
bullets: S&P 500 rises about 0.4% and Nasdaq gains 0.7% midday, led by a tech and semiconductor rally
Nvidia surges on reports of expanded chip sales to Meta, fueling dip-buying in the Magnificent Seven
Cadence and Synopsys outperform as software and chip stocks rebound, while Palo Alto Networks lags
Traders largely dismiss hawkish January FOMC minutes as Treasury yields remain near multi-week lows
The dollar stays firm, gold holds near recent highs, and copper advances alongside tech strength
Global market breadth remains supportive amid sector rotation and ongoing AI sentiment watch
Markets monitor geopolitical tensions, standout movers like MSG Sports, and upcoming PCE inflation data for the next catalyst
